tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE products (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    cost_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    market_trend VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE products (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(100),
  trend_description TEXT,
  trend_start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE pricing_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(100),
  strategy_description TEXT,
  optimal_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE optimal_pricing (
    pricing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    trend_id INT REFERENCES market_trends(trend_id),
    strategy_id INT REFERENCES pricing_strategies(strategy_id),
    optimal_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE product_pricing (
  product_id INT,
  trend_id INT,
  strategy_id INT,
  optimized_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES market_trends(trend_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES pricing_strategies(strategy_id)
);
